descriptionHtml:
Installation ([color=#ff0000]ENBOOST users please read[/color])

Non enboost: Download manually and use 7zip or some other program to extract to the skyrim directory. (sorry not sure how to support NMM so I must disable the option)
Enboost: Extract to a separate folder and rename d3dp.dll to something like SWEETFX_d3d9.dll then make sure you set this in enb local:
[PROXY]
EnableProxyLibrary=true
InitProxyFunctions=true
ProxyLibrary= (New name)


Soft requirements (not exactly required but built around these mods)
Climates of tamriel v5 Night level 1 (2 works fine DO NOT USE 3 you will not even be able to see the sky):http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?
Realistic lighting overhaul: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450/?

Description a sweet FX preset designed to provide vibrant colors, intense light, and darker nights it is not a ENB nor is it designed to mimic one I attempted to follow the KISS rule when it came to the display. The performance hit is quite low you should only notice a drop if you are barely hitting 60 but on the higher or lower ends of the spectrum you should see almost no drop. To toggle on or off ingame use the Scroll Lock key


Credits Ceejay.dk http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/105228 creator of sweet FX please send him a kudos
author: ZZZ02
